frontmatter.description: Health care has fallen into an 'incentive paradox' where the poorer the health of the population, the greater the provider reword is. So the question arises, how do we create new incentives, such as to have a future where hospitals are paid more when their patients are healthy, not sick..
frontmatter.title: Value based health

frontmatter.description: Health care has become dehumanized and medicine has lost its soul. How have we come to this?.
frontmatter.title: Dehumanized health care
